sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
confined to only one place, situation, or person
, obstaja samo na tistem kraju ali je omejeno na tisti položaj ali osebo.

seg.quote: The problem appears to be confined to the tropics.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
Kadar človek
confines himself to something
, dela samo tisto stvar.

seg.quote: They confine themselves to discussing the weather.
Confine your messages to official business.

sense.def:
To confine someone
pomeni nekoga zadržati na kraju, s katerega ne more oditi.

seg.quote: William was confined to an institution for some years.

sense.def:
The confines of an area
so meje nekega območja;
